title: Just got an "attempting to reconnect" message in the client and dodged a ranked game
body: Attempting to reconnect dodged a ranked game because I was unable to ban. I log back in and lose LP

replies.body: If you were reconnecting I can only assume you were in that match for at least the very beginning, in which case I can assume you then disconnected and then the other team voted to remake. The remake would be why you couldn't disconnect and then lost LP, since you would have been the AFK that prompted a remake.
